Search by Criteria
The Metropolitan Museum\n of Art Application
View the entire art collection\n with images and descriptions
Use the tabs below to search\n the entire art collection
Image of the Metropolitan Museum of Art
Department Name:
Default String
Art Departments List
Click on the desired department\n to view collection
Search Art Collection
Use the text fields to narrow collection search\n to your specifications
* You can use all the fields or just one field *
Search Art by Keyword
Enter a keyword here to refine search (Example: Birds)
Check the box for art only with images
Geographical Location (origin of artwork)
Enter the Geographical location here (Example: Africa)
Limit search to art created after a certain year
Enter a year for art after this date (Example: 1700)
Limit search to art created before a certain year
Enter a year for art before this date (Example: 1900)
Search
